resources.string: Enter your bill as a decimal like 70.00, 150.25 or 19855.00, for example. No currency symbols, commas, spaces or other characters, please. Must contain decimal.
How friendly was the service? Enter a number from 1 to 5. 1 is least friendly and 5 is most friendly.
How fast was the service for this kind of restaurant? Enter a number from 1 to 5. 1 is the worst and 5 is the best.
How good was the food? Enter a number from 1 to 5. 1 is the worst and 5 is the best.
How generous are you? Enter a number from 1 to 5. 1 is the least generous and 5 is the most generous.
How much of a tip can you afford to pay? Enter a number from 1 to 5. 1 is the least and 5 is the most.
